name: Literally Literary
description:
Made for Texas A&M's Chillennium Game Jam 2017. The jam's theme this year was 'Role Reversal.' 

Our game starts off in a library. A young world traveler meets an old librarian. He taunts him and says that he's never done anything. It is then that the librarian travels the world trough his novels. 

Also we don't apologize for the name, it was supposed to make it really easy to say when we win awards.

Controls:

Level Hub: Click on a level

Wasd: to move

Space: to fight

E: to interact

ESC: if all else fails

glhf
